name: Totemic Initiate
description: You were born to or have lived among the barbarian tribes of the wild and passed the trials of their sacred totems.
prerequisites: Str 13; Dex 13; Athletic; base attack bonus +5; no barbarian totem rage powers except the one you choose with this feat; nonlawful alignment.
benefit: Choose one barbarian lesser totem rage power (such as lesser beast totem). As a swift action, you can gain the benefits of that rage power as though you were raging. For the purpose of determining that rage powerâ€™s effects, your barbarian level is equal to your base attack bonus. You do not gain any other benefits or penalties of rage. You can gain these benefits for a number of rounds per day equal to your base attack bonus plus your Constitution modifier; these rounds do not need to be consecutive.
